name: claude-code-toolkit
description: Powerful plugins and tools for Claude Code - Time awareness, Discord bot development agents, and more

plugins.name: time-awareness
plugins.description: Automatic temporal context with environment variables for time-aware Claude Code sessions. Exports 20+ time/date variables on every session start via SessionStart hook.

plugins.name: discord-postgres-dev
plugins.description: Expert agents for Discord.py bot development with PostgreSQL using 2025 modern libraries and best practices. Includes discordpy-expert, postgres-expert, and bot-builder coordinator agents.
